author: ylavic
msg: Merge r1526189, r1658765 from trunk.
mod_proxy: Add ap_connection_reusable() for checking if a connection
is reusable as of this point in processing.
mod_proxy_fcgi uses the new API to determine if FCGI_CONN_CLOSE
should be enabled, but that doesn't change existing behavior
since the connection is currently marked for closure elsewhere
in the module.
mod_proxy_http: Use the "Connection: close" header for requests to
backends not recycling connections (disablereuse), including the default
reverse and forward proxies.
Reviewed by: ylavic, wrowe, rjung
Backported by: ylavic

author: cschneider
msg: [ARIES-1326] Allow to define bean id for service ref

author: jleroux
msg: Implements "The lookup and text-area have a read-only attribute but not the text input field" at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-6395

Adds a read-only attribute to the text input field. Using the display type is not enough, because it's uneasy to assign values through Javascript as using the lookup description-field-name shows OOTB. And the disabled option is not good when you want to still show the submitted values on return.
Also
* improves widget-form.xsd documentation about read-only attribute for lookup
* completes the foFormMacroLibrary.ftl where placeholder tabindex  were missing (if this even ever makes sense)

author: ylavic
msg: 2.2.x only.
mod_proxy: Reuse proxy/balancer workers' parameters and scores across
graceful restarts, even if new workers are added, old ones removed, or
the order changes.
Proposed by: jkaluza
Reviewed by: ylavic, jkaluza, wrowe
Backported by: ylavic

author: mibo
msg: Updated Samples
